snippet: Glenn Robinson III hit a 3-pointer with sixth-tenths of a second remaining, Paul George scored 34 points and the Indiana Pacers rallied in the closing minutes to beat the Atlanta Hawks 97-96 on Sunday....

headline.main: U.S. Confirms Avian Influenza in Tennessee Chicken Flock
headline.print_headline: U.S. Confirms Avian Influenza in Tennessee Chicken Flock

lead_paragraph: Glenn Robinson III hit a 3-pointer with sixth-tenths of a second remaining, Paul George scored 34 points and the Indiana Pacers rallied in the closing minutes to beat the Atlanta Hawks 97-96 on Sunday.
